about_the_game:
Matrix Bro is an arcade-style combat game where you control a snake-like formation of brothers to defeat regular monsters, elite monsters, upgrade equipment, and ultimately take down the ultimate Boss.

Survive the Arena

A horde of monsters awaits your arrival, all trying to wipe out your brother formation. Your only chance of survival is to upgrade your gear, carefully choose your lineup, maximize your advantages, and finally take down the ultimate Boss.

Team Lineup

Unlock a variety of brothers, each with unique skills and classes. Grouping brothers of the same class will trigger special abilities. The more brothers you have, the stronger the skills become, increasing your chances of survival.

Mutations

Use special mutation items to upgrade your brothers' levels, change their classes, or cause bizarre effects—but be careful, as some may backfire.

Coupons

Coupons are special items that help you select heroes and mutation items.

Presets

Different presets offer varying starting assets, brother types, and mutation slots, providing unique gameplay experiences.

Tips:

Discover and unlock collectibles with each round of play.

Analyze your team after each battle to optimize your lineup.

Complete levels to unlock new presets.

short_description: Matrix Bro is an arcade-style rougelite battle game where you control a team made up of multiple brothers to defeat all enemies that block their continuous evolution. Of course, this is only possible if your team can survive the relentless onslaught of enemies that keep appearing...
